title: Trump to use $130M anonymous donation to pay military during shutdown
shortDescription: The Trump administration has accepted an anonymous $130 million donation that it plans to use to pay military members during the government shutdown.

title: Trump looking for trade deal on Asia trip
shortDescription: Donald Trump leaves for Asia late Oct. 24 eager to resolve a trade war over tariffs.

title: Canadian ad that miffed Trump will run during two World Series games
shortDescription: Ontario, Canada will keep airing an ad critical of tariffs through the weekend ‒ and then pause it ‒ following President Trump's objections.

title: Ghost stories surrounding the White House
shortDescription: Spiritual abnormalities have roamed the White House nearly as long as it has existed, according to the White House Historical Association.

title: Trump Jr. snipes at Chelsea Clinton's East Wing demolition comments
shortDescription: President Trump's eldest son takes to X to blast Chelsea Clinton's criticism of the White House's East Wing demolition for a $300 million ballroom.

title: Trump deploys USS Gerald Ford to South America
shortDescription: Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth deployed a U.S. nuclear-powered aircraft carrier and guided missile destroyers to the South American coast.

title: The NFL and Trump's Bad Bunny clash
shortDescription: The Trump administration has criticized the NFL's Superbowl performer, Bad Bunny, but this is how it fits into their plan to capture new audiences.

title: White House demolition: See before and after photos
shortDescription: Satellite photos show dramatic changes at the White House.

title: Trump eyes trade deal with China on Asia trip amid US farmers' worries
shortDescription: Trump hopes to negotiate a trade deal with China while farmers worry about selling the fall harvest amid a war over the president's tariffs.

title: White House demolition before and after
shortDescription: Satellite images show East Wing demolition as new ballroom construction begins at the White House.

title: White House rubble goes to DC golf course
shortDescription: The White House's East Wing construction rubble was driven and dropped off at D.C.'s East Potomac Golf Course.

title: Historic impact of White House demolition
shortDescription: President Trump’s plan to replace the East Wing with a ballroom raises alarm among preservationists and historians.

title: Trump ends Canada trade talks over Reagan ad
shortDescription: President Donald Trump says he's ended trade negotiations with Canada for using Ronald Reagan in an ad slamming tariffs and trade wars.

title: Grassley urges Trump to stop social media posts on importing beef
shortDescription: Grassley, opposed to Trump proposal to import Argentina beef, says president 'better off' if he stopped tweeting, 'kept his mouth shut on that issue.'

title: What is Trump's approval rating? Shutdown drags on, East Wing leveled
shortDescription: President Donald Trump's approval rating is low but stable. The government has been shut down for three weeks and the East Wing has been demolished.

title: Trump target Letitia James greeted by cheers as she pleads not guilty
shortDescription: New York Attorney General Letitia James, who once sued President Donald Trump and is now his target, pleaded not guilty to multiple criminal charges.

title: Trump preps for Asia trip, Senate recesses on shutdown Day 24
shortDescription: The second-longest government shutdown enters its 24th day with Congress out of session and the funding lapse heading toward next week.
